string.name: what_s_new_toast
string.font:
- Enhanced the "Personalize" screen with a two-pane layout for an improved experience on large screens and in landscape mode. 
 - Introduced "One Player," our new app and the successor to Audiofy. 
 - Removed the "Upgrades" section from the app. 
 - Streamlined the UI by relocating the "Accent Color in Navigation Bar" option to Settings. 
 - Refined the splash screen with an updated background color for a more polished launch.

item.font:
We've enhanced the functionality of the app. 
 We're utilizing the new, advanced NowPlaying API for real-time updates regarding playback metadata state. 
 We've added a new Dynamic Widget that automatically adjusts to size. 
 More App Widget styles are coming soon.
